website_summaries.verdict: This is a modern-looking pair of women’s bowling shoes with loafer treatment that perform well at the bowling alley, making them a winner.
pros: Comes in 3 color options – including bright options as well as more muted tones
These feature a spacious and comfortable toe area for comfort while bowling
Bottom allows for enough slide at bowling alley while possessing solid traction
cons: It takes a few wears to fully break these shoes in

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: the shoes have thin felt and the rubber hangs over the toe, makes sliding hard, also has a flaw in the bridge where the rubber, hangs down too much and again makes sliding difficult. Comfy but not loving them. I ended up buying a sleeve to help with the sliding, another 13 bucks onto of what the shoe cost. i wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: and the shoes are great! I normally wear a 9w
customer_reviews.text: The deliver was speedy, and the shoes are great! I normally wear a 9w, but I ordered a 8.5 and they fit perfectly! They have a nice wide toe area and are very comfortable. The look of the shoe is fantastic. I wear boat shoes on a day to dad basis, so when I saw these I jumped! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable. They do run a little big though. I have to tie them tight so they don't slip. They fit perfect at first but stretched a little after wearing them a few times. I would definitely recommend them. Just go down half a size. I have wide feet too.
customer_reviews.author: DogResq

customer_reviews.title: 5 M and it's perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated all the sizing information and wanted to add/confirm that you should go down a 1/2 size only if you are a medium or narrow width. If you have wide feet, you probably want to stay true to size. I am a size 7 medium and I chose the 6.5 M and it's perfect for me. I haven't tried these out yet, so I can't speak to the sliding ability, but I'm sure it'll be fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Turtleback Lane

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but cute
customer_reviews.text: The shoe doesn't feel "secure" to me. Laces end mid-foot, but that could be the style? However, the tip or toe part of the shoe is a little narrow for my feet, but everything else fits good. Unfortunately, I only wore these shoes 3 times and the bottom slide material came off on one shoe. The shoes look good and stylish, but I would definitely invest in more quality product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable bowling shoes. They don’t tie super tight like sneakers, they are on the looser side. If you have a normal to wide foot these wil fit perfectly. If you have more of a narrow foot then they may fit a little loose. The best part is they match with almost any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love my Brunswick Karma bowling shoes! They are cushioned and soft enough to not cause blisters on first wear. They do run slightly larger like rental bowling shoes, but the with the laces tight and the cushioning, I was not bothered. I wear an 8-8.5 in regular shoes and the 8 is fine. I could wear a 7.5, but didn't exchange them. I'm not a serious bowler and can not review the slide, but they are not as slick as rentals. They are cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Nelee

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, arrived on time, look and wear as expected
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly as pictured. They fit exactly correct. They arrived on the expected delivery date. They feel and wear as they should. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Duran

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfortable, light weight and match with about everything
customer_reviews.text: Just joined a bowling team at work and wanted my own pair of shoes. They are super comfortable, light weight and match with about everything. If you want bowling shoes that don't look like clown shoes and are comfortable buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but wide feet beware!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these awhile ago and they’re soooo cute, people don’t even think they’re bowling shoes and I get tons of compliments. I have wide feet so these are a bit narrow for me and give me blisters around my toes. I probably just need to wear them more or stretch them a bit. I didn’t want to size up because then only feet would slip around. I’m not willing to return them because they’re otherwise a great pair of shoes and I can make it work with really thin socks. For reference I am not a frequent bowler, I just love to bowl when I can and thought I’d invest in a pair of bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: XKatrina

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I purchased these at the end of February...and then the pandemic shut everything down in March. In the past, I have always rented shoes from the bowling alley. It seemed like it was finally time for me to get my own pair of bowling shoes. I was able to try these out once before the bowling alleys shut down. I love the color of these shoes, and they fit well. I purchased a set of Lock Laces to replace the standard laces on the shoes, and they worked well for the one time I was able to actually bowl with them on. I look forward to going bowling in the future with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Order half size down, super cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size down after following the advice of other reviews and they fit perfect. They are stylish and a bit wider than most bowling shoes, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: holliforpresident

customer_reviews.title: Updated look
customer_reviews.text: I take size 7 1/2 and this shoe fit well. It has the right amount of slide on the alley. Very nice bowling shoe with an updated look
customer_reviews.author: chris wiley

customer_reviews.title: great bowling shoe - CUTE, COMFORTABLE, COOL & FELT GOOD ON THE LANES.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition with slightly damaged original box as advertised. I tried these for the 1st time on a hot humid day and found these shoes cooler than my old ones with enough stretch over my bunions to stay comfortable. The glide on the lanes was good for me. All of this and cute too?? - I am VERY happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Texas shopper

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend ordering a half size smaller unless you wear thick ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do run a little on the large size. Would recommend ordering a half size smaller unless you wear thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: K Crews

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and cute! My last Brunswick bowling shoes were a size 8, so I took advice of others to get a half size smaller and they fit perfect. They are a bit wide, I do have narrow feet, but can tie them tight enough. I had no problem sliding first time using them, but I also walked around at home on carpet for a little bit first. Not sure if that did anything. Fit nicely in my bag, don't have to jam them under my ball. All-and-all a nice shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Chicklett

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and looks great for a bowling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of the funky looking and unmistakeable bowling shoe. I could easily walk around in my daily life with this shoe (but I won't, of course!) and no one would notice that it wasn't a daily shoe. It is extremely comfortable and needed little breaking in. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: H. Klingler

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all! Run narrow.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very uncomfortable and the heel slips giving you a blister. I ordered a half size down as others suggested but they are too tight. They are not good for wide feet. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I really like the both pairs of bowling shoes - especially the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the both pairs of bowling shoes - especially the uppers - but have problem with the heels. There is some type of rubber inset and I can't slide with them and I slide on my whole foot and not just the front of the show. Will have to take them to a local shoemaker to see if he can correct the problem. Otherwise, satisfied with the upper part of the shoe and the colours. Thank you Marty Felker maarstan98@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Marty Felker

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect if...
customer_reviews.text: I go to a bowling alleys often. I always get a half a size smaller than normal shoe sizes because that's how they run. When I ordered these shoes, I ordered them to my Bowling shoe size and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is heavy cushioned on the inside. It is soft, but the thick insides makes it bulky, and thereby the sizing off. This means your normal size is too tight. I bought these back in December, and did not anticipate this issue, so was unable to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Dhaynes10

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rubber heel soles prevent me from sliding at the line. I can’t use these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2cycle

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight shoe, regular/wide toe. No issues. Such fun colors. Feel comfortable compared to rentals. Saved so much cost to not rent. Wore for 2-4 games a week all summer when I took my children for Kids Bowl Free program, plus a few dates nights.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Soo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo comfortable! True to size. My feet tend to be slightly wide but these are soft with pliable material and fit perfectly. I am an amateur bowler and don’t do any sliding with my approach. I’ve found that I don’t slip nor get stuck on my approach. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bowling for fun, laughs, family, friends and fellowship
customer_reviews.text: Loved these bowling shoes 👞 Fit like glove and my bowling is only getting better with these light weight, memory foam. 💯 % easier, I replaced laces with no lace rip cord adjustable fit. What a great way to bowl
customer_reviews.author: Helenann Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit well and I’ve had great compliments on the look. Fits like a loafer, not a laced shoe. Unfortunately these are not comfortable for me. Laces are low so it binds at bend of foot (base of toes) if you tie laces tight. Because laces are lower, heel isn’t secure in the shoe. Shoe slides off heel when walking. Bottom material is good for those that do not glide or little glide in their approach. My plan is to keep them as a backup pair.
customer_reviews.author: JFrank

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM BOWLERSTORE!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves were fine although they did not fit true to size (too big). However DO NOT buy from Bowlerstore, they charge a restocking fee and shipping on UNUSED shoes that are returned but do not fit. Only store on Amazon I have ever had to pay to return something that didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a bowling shoe that's sole will fall off after 4-5 wears, get these shoes. They'll say they understand that the product must be defective, ask you to return, then say that since the item is used, you don't get your money back. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowling Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes after not having bowled in many years. They are flexible and comfortable. The only issue I have is that I wish it came in a wide width. I have flat feet and had to go up a bit in size to accommodate the narrow shoe. Overall I really like these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Clements

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable bowling shoes. I ordered the grey pair and they almost dont even look like bowling shoes. Bowling shoes are usually unattractive but these are not!
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Stylish, very comfortable and durable. I like these a lot better because I can get the soft shoe material as tight as I like, whereas some of the leather type bowling shoes I have I just cant get tight enough. Would def buy these again myself and recommend them
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this shoe. Is more stylish than a normal bowling shoe. I ordered my normal size, 6.5, and have to return them for a smaller size. I will order a 6. The toebox is wide which is fine for me but maybe too much for someone with a narrow foot. Have not bowled in these as I need to return for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. They are comfortable, good looking, and best of all, you don't have to wear clown shoes that are breeding grounds for unnamed bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and uncomfortable for my ankles
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely cute and stylish. I really like the color. However, the shoes are not comfortable on my ankles. The collars are stiff and feel unpadded. I don't want to chance wearing them and the shoes not break-in, giving me blisters. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable. Just make sure to use a shoe brush on the bottom because there is no slide to them at first as with most brand new bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great value and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I love that these don’t look like “bowling shoes”. They are a little tight and don’t stretch but are still comfortable enough to keep and wear weekly. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly West

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return because they didn't fit my daughter! I tried bringing them to Staples but she wasn't able to help me!!?? I had to cancel my credit card that I used because someone hacked it!! Please contact me for a return
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Levasseur

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: I stuck like crazy at the approach. Almost killed myself. Something is wrong with this shoe. So disappointed. It is a cute bowling shoe
customer_reviews.author: waitmin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fun shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly. They are comfy and I get attention every time I wear them. Very happy with my decision to order these.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: True to size, very comfortable... everything I expect from a bowling shoe
customer_reviews.author: tricia

customer_reviews.title: They were comfortable and fit my foot well when I tried them ...
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable and fit my foot well when I tried them on from the box. Time will tell if they are comfortable when bowling.
customer_reviews.author: E. V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happy buy
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Works great bot slippery fits as expected. The laces are a little thick and stuff. They are comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Littlelo

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cute option for bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are super confortable and cute. ALWAYS get compliments when I wear them! Definitely worth the money if you bowl more than 3 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: True to size and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and comfortable. Fit true to size and not too narrow. Only small complaint is that they rubbed on the back of my ankle slightly, but I was wearing no-show socks. I think after a couple wears they're be perfect. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Since, I enjoyed the comfort and didn’t mind spending the cost, a friend of mine said they received the tennis shoe look for only $17.00? The shipment was awesome. Thanks:)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: They don't look like bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: As described. Fit well I ordered an 8.5 and they're just wide enough. They don't look like bowling shoes. I've used them about 5x so far.
customer_reviews.author: brooke locklin

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowling shoes. They are very comfortable and look cute, too. I'm not a professional bowler, but they work well for the few times I go per year!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: ... them because they did not slide down the lane like I expected
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoe but I returned them because they did not slide down the lane like I expected. Nothing wrong with the shoe. Just not the type I needed. It had been a long time since I bought bowling shoes so I forgot to research different types of soles to fit my style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the grey in size 9 (women) which is true to my size. These are great shoes for starter.
customer_reviews.author: Jimberley W.

customer_reviews.title: Bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: We really liked the style because it was for a young girl to wear. They are comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: stac crane

customer_reviews.title: Where them a few times before you send them back
customer_reviews.text: Almost sent them back. Until I wore them a couple times and they became very comfortable. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe; great fit. It's stylish as well as functional
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe; great fit. It's stylish as well as functional. It's not to big like some "sneaker-type" bowling shoes are. I highly recommend this particular shoe. I bought my regular shoe size and it fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: PRC

customer_reviews.title: They are super light and soft on
customer_reviews.text: These are so darned cute, and they fit perfectly I'm a size 7 normally. They are super light and soft on.
customer_reviews.author: M. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant design!
customer_reviews.text: Buying more, to keep around the house, and not just the car's. Kitchen, bedroom. These will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these shoes. They do not slide. I contacted the vendor and because I was past my return period I am unable to send them back. I have been trying to "break them in" as suggested. Nothing has helped. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size 7 1/2 size which I wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 7 1/2 size which I wear and it was way to big for me. Still have them in the box they came in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Schnetzer

customer_reviews.title: I just wore them bowling for the first time. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wore them bowling for the first time. They are comfy, true to size and worked well on the lanes. AND they're really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but don't slide
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new pair of bowling shoes because my previous ones were starting to fall apart. Ordered these because I thought they were cute, which they are, but you CAN NOT SLIDE!! I'll be returning for a refund. Really wish they'd slide because they are cute and no one else has any at my bowling alley.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and aren’t too narrow. I have been super happy with them. The quality seems good and the size was right on.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but take some breaking in.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice, but not as wide a width that I had hoped for. I'm still working them in too - they're still sticking on the lanes, but are getting better. I absolutely love the colors and the shoes are comfortable - I can't wait for them to be fully broken in so that I can wear them every week.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R Foster

customer_reviews.title: They are adorable and don't even look like bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable and don't even look like bowling shoes! I stuck at first but wore them around my house for a few days and that really helped!
customer_reviews.author: Wiebel87

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! They're stylish too, they have the flair for fun and I'm always asked where I got my shoes. They're surprised I didn't find them in the bowling shop. Great quality shoe, fits as expected, and very tasteful in design.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Seemed Like a Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Evidently I didn’t know my own shoe size, because these were very short! I normally wear at ladies size 7, but my big toe was rubbing the end of the shoe before I took a step! Guess I needed a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Reizer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, they look good on her and she says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Griess

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowling Shoes -- No more stinky rentals
customer_reviews.text: Best bowling shoes I have had in 45 years -- fits just like the ones I had when I was bowling weekly
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wiedenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Stylish. Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, affordable and shipped fast! Love my new shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: satara

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size 9 because that is my shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 because that is my shoe size. Fit a bit large and kept coming off my heel. Toe is narrow and pinched.
customer_reviews.author: Ampxela

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bowling shoes. They look great for bowling shoes and the fit was good. Ordered my regular size shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and go with everything
customer_reviews.text: Bowling shoes used to be so ugly! These are cute and fit well. I guess they are adequate for bowling. I haven't taken any spills!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie D

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: They fit as sized. They're super cute! They are super comfortable! They are not all old school and boring. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Fidget Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: One of the worse purchases I've ever made. After 3 months of use I still cannot slide on my approach. I walk up to the foul line and throw the ball! You would think by now the shoes would be "worn in". I'm tossing them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good comfortable shoe takes a while to get scuffed enough to slide
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great bowling shoes! I ordered a half size smaller than I normally wear (as I do for all bowling shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: ... even tell you have shoes on they are so comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Can't even tell you have shoes on they are so comfortable....I love them and get so many compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Malone

customer_reviews.title: So I would recommend ordering down a size
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 in most shoes and these were too big for me. So I would recommend ordering down a size.. They left a huge blister on my heel, but that was only after the first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great cute bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First time I bowled in them, my toes felt all jammed. From then on out they felt fine and they are really cute and comfortable to bowl in.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBshoppin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY! I normally were a size 12 and they fit great. they are breathable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Tomaine

customer_reviews.title: Completely happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit like a glove so I was a little concerned that they might be too small. Not so. They are perfect, comfortable, and are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: KatherineH

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: love the color,fit and comfort. used them 5 times. each time is better
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, I feel it is true to bowling shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I feel it is true to bowling shoe size. (I can wear a 9.5 but at the bowling alley I always get a 9 so I purchased the 9)
customer_reviews.author: J J Driscole

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and so stylish. Love them and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: I. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are solid bowling shoes. They have a relaxed fit to them so if you are looking for a tight shoe, this is not it. Overall stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Archambo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and true to size. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: VickiG

customer_reviews.title: Fit as described
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes fit perfectly. I sometimes have to get an 8 in shoes because I have a wide foot, but these were very comfortable in the 7 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schwandt Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They're cute and comfortable and serve their purpose. Run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and fit great! I look forward to bowling now!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Itzaes cute but it fías big at least 1 size big.
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise they would have been fine.
customer_reviews.text: My heel kept slipping when I walked on them. Otherwise they would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine  Wirkala

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a softer bowling shoe. These were still stiff, but it was much better than what I had
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable, nothing to complain about. Happy I chose these
customer_reviews.author: Isaak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these in time for a bowling game and they are very comfortable and stylish. If Keds and Sperry had a spinoff this is what it would look like. Plenty of support, lightweight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: NAT

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Afraid to order shoes online. Ordered my regular size and fit perfect..width and length!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Needed ne bowling shoes really bad! These are so nice & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed ne bowling shoes really bad! These are so nice & comfortable! Also stylish, they don't even look like bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dalen

customer_reviews.title: They don’t slide
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes but they do not slide!!!! Almost fell on my face. Need to return 😭
customer_reviews.author: Sicy

customer_reviews.title: would buy the again
customer_reviews.text: stuff like new shoes! great for bowling just need to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Becsss

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were comfortable but I was totally incapable of sliding
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were comfortable but I was totally incapable of sliding. The heels stuck to the floor and so did the toes. I had to wear a shoe sleeve and use non-stick product on the heels for at least 3 weeks. Still using the shoe sleeve. Would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I am a young bowler. I always hated to bowling shos because they make my feet look all big. But these are so cute. I constantly get compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Friend liked them so much, she ordered a pair.
customer_reviews.author: K. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The demon is very versatile and they are super comfy. I hope they last for years of league to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: These were too big. They were ok other than ...
customer_reviews.text: These were too big. They were ok other than that though.
customer_reviews.author: CM

product_meta.title: Karma Ladies Bowling Shoe,
product_meta.description: The Brunswick Ladies Karma is a stylish, comfortable, and breathable bowling shoe. The lightweight design of this shoe will keep you bowling game after game. Performance mesh uppers Foam padded collar and tongue Comfort slip-on or lace construction Light-weight rubber outsole Pure slide microfiber slide soles on both shoes Superior slide immediately Sizes: M 6-10, 11
